name: Miasma (MezzanineGames)
description: After several years away the player, known only as The Doctor, returns to their home city of Krówka (krof-ka) to find it ravaged by a deadly plague that renders its citizens madly violent and its streets overrun with beasts and vermin. With the guidance of your lab assistant Grigori, take to the rooftops in this gothic platformer and take back your city.
